20110113150033.000|20110113150035.000|TR0|a winter storm that dumped as much as two 
20110113150035.000|20110113150038.000|TR0|feet of snow.  Boston's Logan Airport 
20110113150038.000|20110113150041.000|TR0|canceled hundreds of flights, schools

20110113150043.000|20110113150046.000|TR0|expected to lift its snow emergency this 
20110113150046.000|20110113150048.000|TR0|morning.
20110113150048.000|20110113150051.000|TR0|
20110113150051.000|20110113150054.000|TR0|In Australia's third most populated city, 
20110113150054.000|20110113150056.000|TR0|more than 20,000 homes are underwater.  
20110113150056.000|20110113150059.000|TR0|Authorities say it could take months to 
20110113150059.000|20110113150102.000|TR0|repair the damages left by the worst 
20110113150102.000|20110113150104.000|TR0|flooding in decades.  The weeks of 
20110113150104.000|20110113150107.000|TR0|relentless rains left at least 15 people 
20110113150107.000|20110113150109.000|TR0|dead and another 70 still missing from 
20110113150109.000|20110113150112.000|TR0|that flooding.
20110113150112.000|20110113150115.000|TR0|
20110113150115.000|20110113150117.000|TR0|The death toll is far greater in Brazil 
20110113150117.000|20110113150120.000|TR0|where heavy rains unleashed flooding and 
20110113150120.000|20110113150122.000|TR0|mudslides.  Hundreds of people confirmed 
20110113150122.000|20110113150125.000|TR0|dead. Forecasters say the rains could 
20110113150125.000|20110113150128.000|TR0|continue for a few more days.
20110113150128.000|20110113150130.000|TR0|
20110113150130.000|20110113150133.000|TR0|Well, cafeteria workers at public schools 
20110113150133.000|20110113150136.000|TR0|across the country could soon be dishing 
20110113150136.000|20110113150138.000|TR0|out a different kind of meal, a healthy 
20110113150138.000|20110113150141.000|TR0|one. The USDA is calling for a serious 
20110113150141.000|20110113150143.000|TR0|overhaul of the federal school meal 
20110113150143.000|20110113150146.000|TR0|program.  It wants to raise nutrition 
20110113150146.000|20110113150149.000|TR0|standards for the first time in 15 years.
20110113150149.000|20110113150151.000|TR0|
20110113150151.000|20110113150154.000|TR0|That means that trays filled with foods 
20110113150154.000|20110113150157.000|TR0|like chicken McNuggets or chicken nuggets, 
20110113150157.000|20110113150159.000|TR0|rather, tater tots, chocolate milk and 
20110113150159.000|20110113150202.000|TR0|popsicles would be replaced with something 
20110113150202.000|20110113150204.000|TR0|that may look a little more like this -- 
20110113150204.000|20110113150207.000|TR0|baked fish nuggets, broccoli, skim milk 
20110113150207.000|20110113150210.000|TR0|and a peach.
20110113150210.000|20110113150212.000|TR0|
20110113150212.000|20110113150215.000|TR0|Agriculture Chief Tom Vilsack says it's 
20110113150215.000|20110113150217.000|TR0|part of the plan to address childhood 
20110113150217.000|20110113150220.000|TR0|obesity.  About one in three children in 
20110113150220.000|20110113150223.000|TR0|adolescence are overweight.
20110113150223.000|20110113150225.000|TR0|
20110113150225.000|20110113150228.000|TR0|Dora Rivas, the immediate past president 
20110113150228.000|20110113150231.000|TR0|of the School Nutrition Association 
20110113150231.000|20110113150233.000|TR0|joining us live via Skype from Dallas, 
20110113150233.000|20110113150236.000|TR0|Texas.
20110113150236.000|20110113150238.000|TR0|
20110113150238.000|20110113150241.000|TR0|So, Dora, the USDA wants to scale back 
20110113150241.000|20110113150244.000|TR0|sodium and trans fats, get in more whole 
20110113150244.000|20110113150246.000|TR0|grains, cut back on the desserts.  It 
20110113150246.000|20110113150249.000|TR0|sounds fantastic. But how do you get kids 
20110113150249.000|20110113150252.000|TR0|to eat this?
20110113150252.000|20110113150254.000|TR0|

20110113150257.000|20110113150259.000|TR0|PRESIDENT:  Well, actually, schools across 
20110113150259.000|20110113150302.000|TR0|the country have already been working on 
20110113150302.000|20110113150305.000|TR0|some of these recommendations for quite a 
20110113150305.000|20110113150307.000|TR0|number of years.  And it is a challenge 
20110113150307.000|20110113150310.000|TR0|for students to try some of these new 
20110113150310.000|20110113150312.000|TR0|items, but we hope that incorporating some 
20110113150312.000|20110113150315.000|TR0|of these new recommendations, along with

20110113150320.000|20110113150323.000|TR0|activity, that we will be able to achieve

20110113150339.000|20110113150341.000|TR0|the kids might not eat it.  They might 
20110113150341.000|20110113150344.000|TR0|just dump it right into the trash.  We've 
20110113150344.000|20110113150347.000|TR0|seen that in the past.

20110113151130.000|20110113151133.000|TR0|PHILLIPS:  Parts of New England are 
20110113151133.000|20110113151135.000|TR0|hammered by much of three feet of snow.  
20110113151135.000|20110113151138.000|TR0|The National Guard has been mobilized in 
20110113151138.000|20110113151141.000|TR0|Massachusetts. Governor Deval Patrick is 
20110113151141.000|20110113151143.000|TR0|calling on troops to help dig people out. 
20110113151143.000|20110113151146.000|TR0|More than 4,000 homes across that state
